articles.title: UK inflation falls as food and eating out costs ease - BBC.com
articles.description: February's drop to 3.4% means the cost of living is now rising at its slowest pace since September 2021.

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.title: Bitcoin tumbles from record high as Grayscale ETF outflows hit $12bn - Financial Times
articles.description: Cryptocurrency down 16% from its peak as net fund flows turn negative
articles.content:
Bitcoin has fallen 16 per cent from its all-time high last week, as the investor flows into new stock market funds that had driven a huge rally this year go into reverse.
The worlds largest cryptocu… [+2177 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft bets on start-ups to extend AI lead with poaching of Inflection chief - Financial Times
articles.description: Satya Nadella’s appointment of Mustafa Suleyman continues strategy of developing ties with fledging AI companies
articles.content: Then $199 for 12 months. Insight and expertise in your hands with the iconic FT print edition, delivered Monday to Saturday.
